thread.title: Felicia Lane Savage
thread.title_full: webuyanycar.com reviewed by Felicia Lane Savage

author: Felicia Lane Savage
title: Felicia Lane Savage
text: Tim Burns' customer service skills were extraordinary. As a woman, talking with men in his position has usually been a power play! Tim was respectful, knowledgeable and added humor to a situation that was very vulnerable for me. He treated me as an equal. I would send my Grandma to him and I would know he would treat her kindly.
